title: New: Lana Del Rey – National Anthem
body:
With just under a month until the release of her debut LP _**Born To Die**_, another track set to feature on the record has found it’s way onto the internet.

It’s an upbeat, R’n’B styled number, quite **GaGa**\-esque in nature if I’m honest, but in typical **Lana** fashion, it just works. Whether these staggered leaks are a ploy to keep the blogosphere buzzing or someone out there has a personal vendetta to settle, who knows, either way, it’s certainly serving to build anticipation for her upcoming record. Check out _National Anthem_ below.
